data.title: GamesRadar+
data.meta_description: GamesRadar+ takes you closer to the games, movies and TV you love.
data.text:
We've played Dune: Awakening and it's a real treat for Dune fans

We've had our hands on Funcom's foray into the epic Dune universe, and in the first two minutes we angered a sandworm, nearly died of thirst, and got killed by scavengers.
